analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/38/0x23f349549a0ce93e18a66fc92f19c73d01f5941d.sol:
	Contract NuevaToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/38/0x23f349549a0ce93e18a66fc92f19c73d01f5941d.sol#202)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of NuevaToken.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/38/0x23f349549a0ce93e18a66fc92f19c73d01f5941d.sol#203) is not in mixedCase
